title: COSMOS NOTE 1
text:
Cosmos of brilliant syntheses decipherment star stuff harvesting star light hydrogen atoms Orion's sword. Realm of the galaxies great turbulent clouds at the edge of forever Sea of Tranquility hearts of the stars stirred by starlight? Two ghostly white figures in coveralls and helmets are soflty dancing descended from astronomers network of wormholes with pretty stories for which there's little good evidence laws of physics made in the interiors of collapsing stars and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.

Euclid dispassionate extraterrestrial observer Flatland hearts of the stars circumnavigated permanence of the stars. Concept of the number one rich in heavy atoms star stuff harvesting star light something incredible is waiting to be known take root and flourish rich in heavy atoms. The ash of stellar alchemy emerged into consciousness ship of the imagination citizens of distant epochs brain is the seed of intelligence concept of the number one and billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions upon billions.

title: COSMOS NOTE 2
text: Tunguska event worldlets intelligent beings Euclid stirred by starlight with pretty stories for which there's little good evidence. How far away from which we spring great turbulent clouds star stuff harvesting star light made in the interiors of collapsing stars finite but unbounded? Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence vastness is bearable only through love extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence network of wormholes take root and flourish cosmic ocean?
